actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution referring the bill H.R. 2209 entitled "A bill for the relief of the Cuban Truck and Equipment Company, its heirs and assigns" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 2209, entitled "A bill for the relief of the Cuban Truck and Equipment Company, its heirs and assigns," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

titles.title: A resolution referring the bill H.R. 2209 entitled "A bill for the relief of the Cuban Truck and Equipment Company, its heirs and assigns" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.
